title: (x) serif font used for "BC" logo - University Roman {J. Edward Sanchez}
content:
I have to recreate this and don’t know my serifs well enough! Help? (Sorry so messy—I took out extra text...)

author: tmiller676

comments.content: Thanks! I’m sure that was a “duh” one for most of you. :)

It’s a ’Yuk!’ one for me.

Nick Cooke

it’s actually a ’eerk’ for me, i have to admit...
